feed.title: Google Cloud: Identity and Access Management
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Identity and Access Management

entry.content:
You can ask Gemini for predefined role suggestions using the IAM role picker in the Google Cloud Console. This feature is in [preview](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages).
For more information, see [Get predefined role suggestions with Gemini assistance](https://cloud.google.com/iam/docs/role-picker-gemini).
entry.summary: Gemini can now suggest predefined IAM roles to help you manage access in Google Cloud. This feature is currently in preview.
entry.title: Feature: Gemini assists with IAM role suggestions

entry.content: Conditions that check the tags for a resource can also check other attributes, such as the resource name of the timestamp of the request. This feature is available in Preview. For more information, see [Resource tags](https://cloud.google.com/iam/docs/conditions-attribute-reference#resource-tags).
entry.summary: Conditions for resource tags can now also check other attributes like resource name and request timestamp. This feature is currently in Preview.
entry.title: Changed: Attribute conditions for resource tags now available in Preview

entry.content: Workforce Identity Federation supports [detailed audit logging](https://cloud.google.com/iam/docs/workforce-identity-federation#detailed-audit-logging), which you can use to troubleshoot attribute mapping issues. This feature is [generally available](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages).
entry.summary: You can now audit workforce identity federation with detailed audit logging to help troubleshoot attribute mapping issues. This feature is generally available.
entry.title: Feature: Workforce Identity Federation Now Supports Detailed Audit Logging
